title: The Century Quilt - meanings of the quilt

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Waniek uses literary elements and techniques to develop the complex meanings that the speaker attributes to The Century Quilt.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Waniek uses literary elements and techniques to develop the complex meanings that the speaker attributes to The Century Quilt.

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Identify and explain the function of a symbol.
